messages.message: Ohh, yeah, I had to add an env var locally.
oh I actually can see the audit logs!
Yeah I thought I merged in the change to actually set it (I thought maybe I updated the wrong file). So hopefully you don't need to do anything
I did set `audit_logs_export_endpoint`, but I can see the logs directly at `apps/audit-logs` so no need to check search-service
oh I see, hrm, that's weird, if you see it there you should see it in the UI
@danny.lan are you setting `audit_logs_export_endpoint=RABBIT_MQ`to see the audit logs in `apps/audit-logs`? Also is your crafting env based on the ib-dev backend template?
oh I’m saying I CAN see the logs in the UI so there’s no problem
let me try reproducing it, i believe even with `audit_logs_export_endpoint=RABBIT_MQ` , `apps/audit-logs` was empty so I want to figure out how to replicate that
